title: Ornamental armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ornamental armour refers to a number of armour pieces that are possible rewards from Treasure Trails. All ornamental armours offer the same bonuses and penalties as their standard counterparts (with a couple of minor exceptions in the rune armour variants), although they tend to cost more due to their comparatively higher rarity. Ornamental armour is often worn as a status symbol instead of for practical purposes, especially in free-to-play.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ornamental armour
"Trimmed" redirects here. For the cape, see Trimmed skillcape.

Ornamental armour refers to a number of armour pieces that are possible rewards from Treasure Trails. All ornamental armours offer the same bonuses and penalties as their standard counterparts (with a couple of minor exceptions in the rune armour variants), although they tend to cost more due to their comparatively higher rarity. Ornamental armour is often worn as a status symbol instead of for practical purposes, especially in free-to-play.

Players cannot trim armour. The only way to obtain ornamental armour is through a Treasure Trail or by trading with another player.

Contents

    • 1.1 Bronze armour

    • 1.3 Steel armour

    • 2.2 Green dragonhide armour
    • 2.3 Blue dragonhide armour
    • 2.4 Red dragonhide armour
    • 2.5 Black dragonhide armour
    • 2.6 God trimmed leather armour
  • 3 Magic armour
    • 3.1 Wizard robes
  • 4 Other
  • 5 Trivia

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The iron melee armour has a different colour for its trimmed variant so as to not confuse the armour with trimmed steel melee armour.
  • All the god, trimmed, heraldic, and gilded versions of rune have the same exact stats as regular rune, with the interesting exception of the god and trimmed variants of the rune kiteshield: these have a ranged attack bonus of -2, as opposed to the -3 stat shared by all the others. Apart from that, the only other difference is that God armour has a +1 Prayer bonus per piece.
